descriptions.description: Add features to a single page application & Rails application for Discovery, Talk, & Member Pages
using TypeScript, React, Tailwind CSS, Next.js, Ruby on Rails
Create & add components to TED UI Design System
Build ingestion tool for Sharepoint migration
Develop single page applications using Vue.js
Develop backend microservices using TypeScript, & Node.js
Deliver HTML, JavaScript, & CSS to the client using Vue.js, SASS, & TypeScript
Aggregate legacy APIs using Node.js, GraphQL to feed into Design Library components
Refactor Microservices for modularity, improving testability & readability of code
Create maintainable code with Functional programming & Test Driven Development
Participate in hiring & onboarding processes by creating assessments & documentation
Deliver HTML, JavaScript, & CSS to components using React, Angular, SASS, & TypeScript
Add & improve performance of Infor Design Library components
Create Progressive Web Application utilizing AWS Lambda & Lex, & other third party APIs
Build sites & REST APIs using WordPress, Node.js, ExpressJS, & AngularJS
